toxml

Class Java2XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • toxml.Java2XML

  • public class Java2XML
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class which provides simple methods to generate the XML representation of the source code.

    1.0
    Author:
    Harsh Jain
